problem.title: CheckPoint: Conservation of Momentum 2
problem.p: Pendulum 1 is released from an elevated position at \(t=0\). It swings downward and collides inelastically with pendulum 2 which is at rest before the collision. Both pendula then swing upward together, reaching the top point of the swing at \(t = t_{3}\) .
Let's define \(t_{1}\) to be the instant right before the collision, and \(t_2\) to be the instant right after the collision.
Assuming that the collision happens nearly instantaneously, \(t_2 \approx t_1 \), for the system that includes both pendula, the momentum is conserved:

choice.name: foil3
choice.p: Between 0 and \(t_{1}\) and between \(t_{2}\) and \(t_{3}\) but NOT between \(t_{1}\) and \(t_{2}\)
